content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for coming to see our apartment in Munich. We would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask, what is your budget for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 500 Euro. I hope to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

Thanks for your time and your help.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for sharing your budget, Hassan. I am sorry to say that our apartment is not available for rent at the moment. We are currently seeking a higher rental price for this property. However, I would recommend looking for rental properties in the area that fit within your budget. I hope you have a good luck in your search.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. Thank you for your time. I will look for other options.

By the way, I am a student, and I am very dependable and responsible. I hope to be a good tenant. Is there any discount or incentive that we can discuss for a longer term rental?

Thank you again for your help.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in our apartment, Hassan. I appreciate your willingness to be a good tenant. Unfortunately, we do not offer any discounts or incentives for a longer term rental at this time. However, I would be happy to discuss any other terms or conditions that may be of interest to you. Please feel free to reach out to us if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
